title: केरल नन बलात्कार मामले के आरोपी बिशप का फ़र्ज़ी बयान फिर से प्रसारित
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: ‘Whatever happened between me and nun, it is not rape. It is the Holi Ritual of enlightenment to feel the Magical Existence of Holi Jesus at the end of the act’: Bishop Franco Mulakkal, accused of Rape. pic.twitter.com/F6E7hVMK3q
